title: Fullstack / Frontend Developer - Expansion
description:
Clean-energy tech leads to a positive global transformation. Heating homes contribute to 15% of Europe's CO2 emissions. Switching to sustainable solutions offers households a way to achieve net-zero emissions.
   

  

 Aira's mission is to advance the next generation of home energy solutions, creating intelligent, sustainable homes for a meaningful impact. Starting with innovative heat pumps, it will evolve into a comprehensive, intelligent clean energy-tech system and include dynamic electrical tariffs, cutting-edge home solar systems, and advanced battery storage solutions.
   

  

 Founded in 2022 with already 400 employees and growing, Aira aims to drive the clean energy revolution. We are headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden, and our factory in Poland brings these innovations to life, with operating markets in the UK, Italy, and Germany.
   

  

**About The Role**
 Our Expansion Team is hiring a
 **Fullstack /** 
**Frontend Developer** 
 to help us create web and digital applications that allow our customers to make informed decisions on how to improve the sustainability of their homes. You will help develop the features and applications that ensure a seamless customer journey from the moment the customer has heard of our product to the point of installation.
   

  

 The Acquisition Area consists of three product streams focused on different areas:
   

  

  

* Conversion, specializing in driving sales by efficiently turning leads into customers and effectively communicating our value proposition
* Expansion, guiding the customer through the process from receiving a first solution estimate to an installed product in their home
* Solution design & Installations, focusing on developing all tools needed to find an optimal energy solution and guarantee a smooth installation


 As our Frontend Developer, you will actively participate in ongoing discussions, have a close collaboration with designers and other areas, write clean and scalable code, analyze and optimize User Experience, and much more related to the part our users see and interact with.
   

  

**What characterizes us as a team:**
* A senior team where everyone has a lot of experience to bring to the table
* A cross-functional team setup where developers work closely with designers and product people
* An open mindset where we trust each other to make decisions
* A will to try new ways of working. Sometimes we get it right and sometimes we agree that it might not have been our brightest idea
* Team lunch at least once a week and a daily coffee train down to the lobby to get the nicer coffee


**Challenges we face together:**
* A changing organisation where we need to be smart around how we organise not just as a team but also our infrastructure when it comes to both code and design. We need to be open to change things as they evolve and always have scaling in mind. We like to include the whole team in these kinds of discussions to gather input and experiences from everyone in the team
* An international market, meaning there are unique needs and regulations we need to follow for each and every country we are active in. Our team is a key player that provides the technical platforms for selling our products and we collaborate with teams across the whole company
* Finding new lunch spots that fit our growing team


****What you bring to the team****
* Solid experience with product-driven software development and agile environments
* Experience with React & Typescript
* Experience with automated testing


 We would also appreciate it if you have experience with or knowledge of some of the following:
   

  

  

* Rapid growth journeys (start-ups, scale-ups, new environments)
* Next.js
* Component libraries


**What is in it for you?**
* Gain hands-on experience in a fast-growing scale-up, with a supportive and inclusive culture, and career advancement opportunities.
* Collaborate with diverse teams across international markets and launch products globally.
* Develop and grow personally and professionally in an entrepreneurial-minded environment.
* Thrive in a dynamic, solution-oriented culture, tackling challenges and driving meaningful solutions that make a positive impact on the world.
* Influence the company's success, with a visible impact on product development and market growth.
* Enjoy the flexibility of our hybrid work model and discover our brand-new office at Norra Stationsgatan 93 in Stockholm. Conveniently located near public transport, with Sankt Eriksplan subway station just a few minutes walk away.


 Aira leads in the next generation of Energy. We are driven by our belief that the power of diversity fuels innovation. We welcome individuals from all backgrounds, cultures, and perspectives to join our team, united in our mission to create a better future for society and the planet.

title: Software Developer
description:
At Billogram, we aim to be the good guys of billing. We profit when our clients' customers are happy and make timely payments, rather than benefiting from missed payments and the subsequent debt collection. We believe that treating people well is a sound business strategy. That's why our invoicing and payments platform is engineered to eliminate friction and add value for both our clients and their customers, thereby enhancing their relationship.
 



  





 We're on a mission to become a leader in the European consumer billing market, and we’re looking for a talented Software Developer to help us get there.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 As a Software Developer at Billogram, you’ll be an essential part of our product development team. You’ll work on exciting projects that will push your skills and help you grow in your career. This is a great opportunity for developers who want to deepen their expertise while contributing to a cutting-edge product.
 



  





**What You’ll Do** 



* **Support International Expansion:** 
 Work with our team to standardize and scale our platform, making sure it’s ready for new markets across Europe.
* **Manage Technical Debt:** 
 Help us refine our system to handle larger clients and higher transaction volumes, ensuring it’s built to last.
* **Contribute to Product Development:** 
 Dive into coding, requirement analysis, testing, and ongoing support to help make our platform successful.
* **Collaborate and Learn:** 
 Work closely with senior developers, learning from their experience while bringing your own fresh ideas to the table.



  





**What We’re Looking For** 




 We’re looking for a proactive developer with a solid background in software development and a willingness to tackle new challenges. You should enjoy working in a team and be eager to learn new technologies.
 



  





**Key Qualifications** 



* At least 4 years of experience in software development, with strong skills in Python.
* A good understanding of PHP and a willingness to learn other programming languages.
* Experience working in a product-focused environment with a collaborative approach.



  





**Bonus Skills** 



* Experience in both B2B and B2C environments.
* Familiarity with international expansion and scaling platforms.



  





**What We Offer** 




 Billogram provides a digital billing and payments platform, revolutionizing a forgotten part of the payments industry: the recurring invoice. Using smart technology, we help companies automate the whole payments process, leading to lower costs, increased profitability, and higher customer satisfaction. We want both sender and recipient to have the best experience possible. But since their interests don’t always align, it’s up to us to come up with smart solutions to satisfy both parties.
 



  





 At Billogram, we promise you an exciting journey as we break into new markets and grow at a rapid pace. You will have the freedom and opportunity to develop alongside great colleagues at our office, right in the center of Stockholm. We also offer flexible working hours, exciting challenges, and a whole lot of laughs.
 



  





 We provide equal opportunities and strive for an inclusive and diverse environment. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to gender, transgender identity or expression, ethnicity, religion or other beliefs, disability, sexual orientation, or age.
 



 Welcome to the world of Billogram!

title: Developer Support Engineer for Data Calling
description:
**About Us**
 Sinch is a global leader in cloud communications, helping businesses connect with their customers on their mobile phones. We reach every phone on earth, with over 147 billion conversations every year. Our technology powers the world's leading communications platforms.
   

  

 Are you passionate about being the go-to resource for developer inquiries? Do you thrive on analysis, optimization, and clear communication? If so, we want you on our team! We're expanding our third-line support for our Voice, Video, and Verification products and are looking for someone who can help us become the best we can be. Are you ready for the challenge?
   

  

 We're strengthening our engineering team with a Developer Support Engineer who will serve as the bridge between our clients' developers and our internal team.
   

  

**Role Overview**
 As a Developer Support Engineer, you will be responsible for enhancing the developer experience by continuously improving our reference implementations, sample apps, and documentation, while providing top-notch support to our clients' developers. You'll troubleshoot customer integrations of our SDKs and APIs, track FAQs, and identify patterns that highlight potential SDK improvements. Our SDKs use WebRTC technology, making it easy to add real-time, in-app voice and video calling to our clients' websites or apps.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Handle and analyse third-line support inquiries to ensure our FAQs remain relevant.
* Help keep our developer documentation up-to-date and user-friendly.
* Build reference implementations and sample apps to simplify the integration of our voice, video, and verification SDKs.
* Collaborate closely with other engineers to stay informed about important updates and new releases.
* Focus on quality assurance and provide first-class support to developers.
* Communicate effectively with clients, ensuring their technical issues are resolved promptly and clearly.
* Conduct QA testing of SDKs on mobile devices to ensure optimal performance and usability.


**Requirements**
* Degree in IT, engineering, or a related field, or equivalent work experience.
* High proficiency in English, particularly in writing.
* Strong communication skills, with experience in handling customer support.
* Experience in app development or relevant development roles.
* Strong understanding of the development process and effective communication with developers.
* Interest in voice and video calling technologies.


**Good to have**
* Familiarity with Android and iOS application development (Kotlin, Swift).
* Experience of using tools such as Datadog and Kibana for monitoring systems and performing root cause analysis through detailed log and metric exploration.
* Previous experience in a similar support role.
* Experience with voice and video calling.
* Familiarity with WebRTC technology, IP networks or telecom networks.
* Experience in manual and automated QA testing of SDKs on mobile devices.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**Vill du bli vår nya Senior Backend/Fullstack-utvecklare?** 




  





 Ocab är den mest framåtlutade leverantören av restaureringstjänster av fastigheter i Norden. Vi räddar ekonomiska och miljömässiga värden för tiotusentals boende, företagare och fastighetsägare varje år. Vi är på en spännande tillväxtresa som drivs av utvecklingen av marknadsledande digitala tjänster för våra kunder och användare.
 



  





 En grundpelare i vår framgång är våra digitala produkter. Vi strävar efter att ge vårt produktteam möjlighet att uppnå Objectives och Key Results med verkligt affärsvärde.
 



  





 Vi söker nu en Senior Utvecklare med fokus på Backend, men med förmåga att också ha ett fullstack-perspektiv.
 



  





 Du kommer att arbeta nära dina kollegor i utvecklingsteamet och din produktchef för att bygga spännande nya funktioner och back-end-tjänster som stödjer front-end och mobilapplikationer.
 



  





**Du kommer att få möjlighet att:** 



* Arbeta i ett Empowered-team.
* Utveckla backend-tjänster och API:er i .Net som körs på Azure App Services.
* Hantera och designa våra Cosmos- och SQL Server-databaser.
* Utveckla event-driven systems och integrationer med hjälp av Azure Service Bus.
* Samarbeta nära med produkt och design inom teamet.
* Hjälpa vår Frontend-utvecklare.
* Hjälpa till att hantera vår Azure-plattform med Terraform.



  





**Vem vi tror att du är:** 



* Du har minst fem års erfarenhet av programmering och backend-utveckling.
* Du bidrar med en tydlig åsikt om tekniska val och balansen mellan skräddarsydd programvara och standardlösningar.
* Du har erfarenhet och ett naturligt intresse för att hjälpa dina mer juniora kollegor att leverera fungerande mjukvara till produktion.
* Du drivs av att skapa verkligt affärsvärde genom mjukvaruutveckling.
* Vi har många svensktalande kollegor inom vår fältverksamhet, så du kan självklart kommunicera på svenska inom teamet och har gärna också god förmåga att skriva och tala svenska.



  





**Vi erbjuder:** 



* Ett modernt arbetssätt med produktutveckling.
* Möjligheten att förändra en industri till det bättre.
* Flexibelt arbete med fantastiska kontorslokaler vid Alviks Torg i Stockholm.
* En entreprenöriell kultur med fördelarna av arbetssäkerheten hos ett stort företag.
* Utbildning och utveckling.
* Försäkringar, pension, föräldralön och andra förmåner.



  





  





 Du kommer att välkomnas till ett team av lagspelare med en positiv inställning. Vi ser fram emot att få din ansökan! Urval och intervjuer sker löpande.

title: Software Engineer II - Platform Engineering
company: Warner Bros. International Television Production UK
description:
***Welcome to Warner Bros. Discovery… the stuff dreams are made of.***
**Who We Are…**
 When we say, “the stuff dreams are made of,” we’re not just referring to the world of wizards, dragons and superheroes, or even to the wonders of Planet Earth. Behind WBD’s vast portfolio of iconic content and beloved brands, are the
 *storytellers* 
 bringing our characters to life, the
 *creators* 
 bringing them to your living rooms and the
 *dreamers* 
 creating what’s next…
   

  

 From brilliant creatives, to technology trailblazers, across the globe, WBD offers career defining opportunities, thoughtfully curated benefits, and the tools to explore and grow into your best selves. Here you are supported, here you are celebrated, here you can thrive.
   

  

**Your New Role...**
 The Direct to Consumer (DTC) Group is a technology company within Warner Bros Discovery. We are building a global streaming video platform (OTT), and a suite of applications to support all of our network’s brands globally. We are building modern container-based micro-services operated on AWS. Our platform covers everything from search, catalogue, video transcoding, personalization, to global subscriptions, and really much more. We build user experiences ranging from classic lean-back viewing to interactive learning applications.  We build for connected TVs, web, mobile phones, tablets, and consoles for a large footprint of WBD owned networks including Max, Eurosport discovery+ and many more. This is a growing, global engineering group crucial to WBD’s future.
   

  

 We are hiring a Software Engineer II within the DTC Operational Engineering group with focus on Cluster Engineering. The team is dedicated to provide a secure, efficient and easy-to-use container runtime platform. We build automation for expanding it to new markets, tenants and geographical regions, bootstrapping a fully featured container runtime ready for back-end development teams to use.
   

  

 We team up with other platform teams, manage the lifecycle of critical platform components and work closely with SRE to improve reliability and efficiency of the platform. We provide strategies and processes for lifecycle management of the container runtime environment. We own critical components, assess when we should introduce new ones and set the bar for quality. We focus on reducing security incidents while ensuring cost-effectiveness and supporting the business needs.
   

  

**Your Role Accountabilities...**
 Responsibilities include, but are not limited to, operating Kubernetes clusters (version upgrades and managing critical Kubernetes components like Karpenter), security vulnerability mitigations (rolling out security patches to Kubernetes nodes) and cost optimizations (scaling of our thousands of servers running hundreds of in-house built services, supporting millions of customers across the globe).
   

  

* As a Software Engineer II on the team, you will work with Kubernetes cluster operational tasks like upgrading the Kubernetes version. This includes performing an analysis of what is changing in the new version and how it affects the workload running on each cluster, e.g. deprecated k8s APIs and controller compatibility.
* You’ll use tools to scan clusters for finding things that needs remediation, define actions for it, as well as executing them.
* As part of rolling out upgrades to hundreds of clusters, some ranging up to a thousand nodes, you will identify automation opportunities to reduce the amount of toil needed.
* To keep the runtime infrastructure secure you will roll out security patches to Kubernetes nodes (EC2 AMI updates) on a regular basis (PCI compliance demands new patches to be installed at least every 30 days) and help improve the automation tooling to eventually run this on an automated schedule.
* In order to keep our runtime cost low, you will take part in cost optimization efforts, like tweaking the Karpenter node scaling strategies, increasing the bin-packing efficiency of pods on nodes, ensuring the right node family type is used (m, c, r, spot and Graviton/ARM) and identifying over scaled infrastructure.
* To enable faster time to new markets and onboarding of new tenants to our streaming platform, you’ll work on automating the creation of new Kubernetes clusters together with bootstrapping of critical platform capabilities like service mesh, deployment systems and the observability stack (metrics, tracing, logging).


**Qualifications And Experience...**
* At least 1-2 years of Kubernetes experience.
* At least 1-2 years of AWS experience.
* At least 2-3 years of software development, infrastructure management or operations experience.
* Ability to write code for automation in python, bash or golang.
* Experience with designing infrastructure CI/CD pipelines, e.g. Jenkins or GitHub Actions.
* Experience with IaC, preferably Terraform.
* Used to Helm templating for k8s manifests.
* Understanding of how GitOps tooling like ArgoCD or Flux works.
* Experience in rolling out infrastructure changes to production by following a change management workflow.
* Knowing what metrics to monitor during a change rollout to identify problems.
* Strong ownership mentality during rollouts, stop/rollback and fix if problems occur or escalate to management/on-call if getting stuck.
* Strong sense of security, always using least privileges access and firewall configurations when needed for maintenance.
* Understanding of how running workloads on the Kubernetes clusters may be affected by cluster changes or node rotations.
* Willingness to talk to service development teams and understand their challenges when they report problems during maintenance windows.
* Ability to define and measure KPIs and honor SLAs for infrastructure maintenance.
* Experience with Git and GitHub PR workflows.
* Experience in working with Agile – Sprints, Epics/Stories, Jira.


**How We Get Things Done…**
 This last bit is probably the most important! Here at WBD, our guiding principles are the core values by which we operate and are central to how we get things done. You can find them at www.wbd.com/guiding-principles/ along with some insights from the team on what they mean and how they show up in their day to day. We hope they resonate with you and look forward to discussing them during your interview.
   

  

**Championing Inclusion at WBD**
 Warner Bros. Discovery embraces the opportunity to build a workforce that reflects the diversity of our society and the world around us. Being an equal opportunity employer means that we take seriously our responsibility to consider qualified candidates on the basis of merit, regardless of sex, gender identity, ethnicity, age, sexual orientation, religion or belief, marital status, pregnancy, parenthood, disability or any other category protected by law.
   

  

 If you’re a qualified candidate and you require adjustments or accommodations to search for a job opening or apply for a position, please contact us at recruitadmin@wbd.com.

title: iOS Developer (Intern)
description:
**XR Solutions** 
 is a technology based company that utilizes machine learning and powerful research-based optimizations to provide practical, reliable and optimizing augmented reality solutions to industrial companies.
 



 We believe that our AR technology can change working methods, the way of thinking and enable new innovative solutions that previously was not achievable in industry and machine operation.
 



  





**Role Overview:** 




 We are seeking a passionate and dedicated IOS Developer Intern to join our team for an Internship. This is an exciting opportunity for someone looking to gain hands-on experience in frontend development and XR within a fast-paced and supportive environment.
 



 As an IOS Developer Intern at XR Solutions, you will work closely with our developers.

* Experience utilizing APIs in Swift code.

 *(Meritorious).*

 This is a unpaid internship initially

title: Fullstack utvecklare till innovativt SAAS bolag!
description:
Som fullstack utvecklare hos Visionera får du möjligheten att växa och utvecklas med tiden, tillsammans med duktiga och trevliga kollegor på det centralt belägna kontoret vid Odenplan. Du kommer få stor inblick i företaget och spela en viktig roll för den fortsatta tillväxtresa. För dig som trivs i en miljö fylld med innovation, energi och utmaningar är Visionera rätt plats!
 



  

**Företag :**
 Visionera Aktiebolag
 



  

**Plats :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Enligt överenskommelse
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Rekrytering
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Visionera är ett innovativt mjukvaruföretag som utvecklar verksamhetsstödssystem för alla typer av företag och industrier. De har stor erfarenhet av att hjälpa sina kunder att effektivisera interna processer med olika former av IT-produkter och support. Visionera är idag ledande inom SAAS tjänster och erbjuder dessutom konsulttjänster i sin tjänst- och produktportfölj. Det är ett mindre företag med höga mål och stort hjärta. Beslutsvägarna är korta och du kommer att få en god inblick i hela företagets verksamhet där dina tankar och idéer värdesätts. Visioneras kunder finns över hela världen!
   

 ”På Visionera lär man sig något nytt varje dag, med högt i tak arbetar vi på att utvecklas tillsammans kontinuerligt. Man får också vara med och påverka direkt i en platt organisation och vara drivande i arbetet framåt med produkterna” - Mattias Larsson, Lead Developer
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* En god introduktion, vidareutbildningar och mentor för att du på bästa sätt ska komma in i arbetet och utvecklas tillsammans med Visionera
  
* Ett jobb där ditt privatliv värdesätts. Vi tror att du mår som bäst och presterar som bäst när du får tid för träning, gaming, familj eller andra saker som just du brinner för.
  
* Visar du framfötterna är möjligheterna oändliga! Här kan du växa som person och i din roll, samt ta del av andra aspekter av produktutvecklingen. Det finns exempelvis möjligheter att på sikt arbeta som senior utvecklare, team lead, eller inom test eller UX design.
  
* Visionera säljer sin egen produkt vilket innebär att säljare och supporten sitter bredvid dig och därmed är du nära kunderna och ser produkten leva.
  


  


 Hos Visionera arbetar du med den egenutvecklade SAAS applikation, VisionFlow. Detta system används både av Visionera själva samt av kunderna i deras arbetsprocesser. VisionFlow är ett system för ITSM, ärendehantering och CRM som effektiviserar verksamheter och förenklar kommunikationen mellan avdelningar och team i en gemensamt lösning. VisionFlow kan även integreras med andra system vilket gör att det blir ännu mer kraftfullt. Tack vare VisionFlows konkurrenskraft är Visionera uppe och spelar med de större aktörer trots att de är ett mindre företag. Då systemet är stort och utvecklas från grunden in-house på Visionera, så kommer du som utvecklare sällan känna att du gör samma sak om och om igen trots att du arbetar med samma produkt. Här arbetar du projektbaserat med kundspecifika anpassningar av VisionFlow för att ge kunden den bästa lösningen för sin verksamhet och få ut så mycket som möjligt från sitt användande av VisionFlow.
   




**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Utveckla gränssnitt i Sencha EXT JS (ett Javascript ramverk)
  
* Utveckla ny funktionalitet i systemet, både på klient- och serversidan
  
* Arbeta med infrastruktur, drift och underhåll av systemlösningen tillsammans med kollegorna i DevOps-teamet
  
* Support och åtgärd av buggar
  
* Utveckla och förbättra mobilappen för systemet
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Har en avslutad civil- eller högskoleingenjörsexamen inom datateknik eller motsvarande område
  
* Har goda kunskaper i Java och JavaScript
  
* Har erfarenhet av att arbeta med databaser så som MSSQL och MySQL, samt en vilja att lära dig mer inom området
  
* Har grundläggande kunskaper av webbutveckling, CSS och HTML
  
* Har mycket goda kunskaper i både svenska och engelska i tal och skrift då du använder dig av båda språken i ditt arbete
  


  


  

**Det är meriterande om du har**

Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Visionera Aktiebolag**

 Läs mer om Visionera här !

title: Lead front-end engineer
description:
*DBT was founded with the ambition to empower Small and Medium-sized Enterprises (SMEs) and entrepreneurs by offering them the financing they need to grow. Since our start in 2017, we have supported over 300 Swedish companies with more than SEK 3 billion in loan financing. Backed by prominent investors such as Öhman, Östersjöstiftelsen, Öresund Investment, and with financing secured by the global banking giant NatWest, we are building the next generation SME lender.*
*Leveraging our proprietary digital platform for lending and analysis, we challenge the traditional financing market, offering an alternative or complement to institutional banks and factoring companies. Recognized by Sifted as a "Nordic Scaleup to Watch" and named one of Europe’s fastest-growing companies by the Financial Times in 2021 and 2023, DBT is a registered financial institution under the supervision of Finansinspektionen and is supported by the European Investment Fund (EIF).*
*We are now seeking a business-oriented and self-motivated* 
***front-end developer***
*with the drive to elevate DBT to new heights. Join us in our mission to provide SMEs with the financing they deserve!*
**About The Role**
 As a Lead front-end developer, you will take charge of the technologies that underpin our digital experiences, both for our colleagues and our outward-facing digital products. You will be responsible for bringing our data to the interactive realm and for evolving and maintaining our world-class proprietary front-end technologies built on principles of simplicity and scalability. You will teach your colleagues how it’s done and be a driving force for excellence in a high-velocity environment.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Building great interfaces: Build snappy world-class user interfaces that bring joy to our users.
* UI framework development: Evolve and maintain the leverage of our UI framework that houses the reusable components that allow us to deliver fast.
* Library stewardship: Ensuring that our shared code meets the structural requirements and standards of open-source libraries used by millions of developers.
* Knowledge sharing: Ensure that the team is continuously sharpened in the fields of your knowledge.


 At DBT, we believe in the power of the team and individuals who align with our mindset and values. We are looking for a Front-end developer with a ”we before me” mentality that performs best in a growing, fast-changing, and dynamic environment. You are a curious self-starter with strong business acumen and an entrepreneurial mindset. As an individual, you possess a commercial and structured mindset, coupled with unwavering commitment and drive.
   

  

**Requirements**
* Mastery of JavaScript and TypeScript, coming from at least 5 years of professional experience.
* Proven track-record of driving solutions. A results-driven mindset with the ability to work independently and proactively in a dynamic, fast-paced environment is crucial.
* An eye for design and aesthetics.
* Exceptional logical and reasoning skills.
* Strong communication and negotiation abilities, with a talent for building relationships with new clients.
* Excellent command of both Swedish and English in all forms of communication.
* Background in financial data or data visualization


 At DBT Capital, we are committed to nurturing a culture that combines hard work, camaraderie, and respect. We empower individuals while offering robust team support, creating an entrepreneurial and challenging environment.
   

  

 We will be interviewing continuously. We are looking forward to receiving your online application. For questions, please contact David Ask at david.ask@dbt.se. Please note that we do not accept applications by e-mail because of data protection under GDPR.
   

  

 Warm welcome with your application!

title: Java Software Engineer - Lifetiming Analytics
description:
**About The Role**
 As a Java Software Engineer at Lifetiming Analytics, your responsibilities will involve maintenance development, data logistics, production refactoring and integration, but may also include the development of new and improved features as well as validation and correctness analysis.
   

  

 You'll also be working with DevOps and service operations efforts that involve the deployment of our Quant service application to our Linux based operating environments in AWS. This includes monitoring and addressing any real-time issues as they occur in order to maintain a high level of availability.
   

  

 As we are at an early-stage in our operational developments, this role will also involve establishing, improving and scaling up structures and solutions pertaining to these needs.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 We are looking for a highly motivated engineer with a broad outlook on product development. Maybe you've been working within software engineering for a few years and feel like you might want to take on more product owner responsibilites further on.
   

  

 You are a team player who likes to work together with a team to solve challenges ahead but you're also self-driven and can take your own initiatives when needed.
   

  

 We believe that you have:
   

  

* M.Sc. within Data- or Computer Science or Mathematics
* Deep knowledge in Java and Python programming
* Experience from database technology and SQL
* Documentation and specification skills, and the ability to both document own work and adhere to specifications
* DevOps skills
* Linux server operation including application deployment and provisioning
* Interest in psychology and behavioral science is a plus


**About Lifetiming Analytics AB:**
 Lifetiming is a Stockholm based start-up that designs and develop SaaS products to financial institutions. Lifetiming grew out of an asset manager with an advanced quantative financial analytical and optimizing tool. Lifetiming has lofty goals with expansion in the Nordic region in 2025 and with global ambitions in 2026.
   

  

**Questions and contact**
 In this recruitment, Lifetiming Analytics collaborates with Amendo Tech. For questions about the role, you are welcome to contact Johanna Hallenberg at johanna.hallenberg@amendotech.se. We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

 #IT

title: Backend Engineer - CS Tech
description:
**About Us**
 In 2022, Instabee was founded after combining Budbee and Instabox - two leading last-mile delivery companies with three consumer-facing brands: Budbee, Instabox, and Porterbuddy. Instabee serves millions of consumers across Europe with convenient deliveries and is on track to become the leading European e-commerce enabler. Always with the consumer at heart.
   

  

 We’re fast, both in terms of parcel delivery and when it comes to growing our business. So far our journey has taken us from Sweden to the rest of Scandinavia and parts of continental Europe, but we have no plans on stopping anytime soon. As we continue to expand, the complexity of Instabee grows in parallel. With that in mind, we’re now looking for you to help us on the journey ahead.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We’re now looking for an experienced Backend Developer who can drive the development of our admin tools and customer service solutions. The users and stakeholders for what we build are our colleagues. You’ll be working closely with Product Managers and Engineers to build and integrate customer service tools, focusing on our parcel journey system and chatbot solution.
   

  

 Your expertise will shape the core of our customer service offering, and your contributions will directly enhance service efficiency across multiple channels. If you're passionate about creating robust, backend services that help other teams function seamlessly, we want to meet you!
   

  

**Your Future Team**
 You’ll join a social, collaborative team where freedom under responsibility is key. You’ll have the opportunity to directly influence how we support customer service teams.
   

  

**What We’re Looking For**
 We’re looking for a senior backend developer with at least 5 years of experience. If you’ve worked in the CS domain, building back-office tools and internal service solutions, you’ll fit right in. We’re seeking someone who enjoys solving complex problems, particularly in creating efficient service solutions.
   

  

**Some Key Skills And Experiences We’re Looking For**
* 5+ years of backend development experience
* Proficiency in Node.js and TypeScript
* Experience with customer service tools, internal admin systems, or similar domains
* Experience with any major cloud provider (e.g. AWS, GCP), Kubernetes, Terraform
* Problem-solving skills with a focus on long-term, scalable solutions
* Experience in working with an agile development methodology
* Comfortable making decisions
* Proficient in English
* Based in Sweden (Stockh


**What You’ll Get**
 We can promise you that you will be challenged, develop your skills and have the opportunity to work with truly amazing and competent colleagues. If you like changes and want to set new processes and ways of working - this is the place for you!
   

  

**Benefits**
 Of course, we have all the necessary and standard benefits in place, but in addition to this, we can also offer:
   

  

 🌇 Sky-High Office: Modern and newly renovated with a 360-degree view around Stockholm.
   

  

 🐶 Puppy Friendly: Bring your dog to work - we've got a whole floor for our furry friends!
   

  

 🍸 Rooftop Fridays: Chill out at our Friday rooftop bar with the best views in town
   

  

 🥐 Wednesdays Tech Breakfasts: Fuel your midweek with tech talks and tasty bites.
   

  

 👾 Tech Demos: Dive into the latest innovations with our regular tech showcases.
   

  

 💻 Modern Tech Stack: Work with cutting-edge technology every day.
   

  

 🏓 Fun & Games: Ping pong, Shuffleboard, Foosball, and even a Karaoke Room for your leisure time.
   

  

 ⏰ Flexible Hours: Hybrid setup with working hours that adapt to your lifestyle.
   

  

 👶 Parental Pay for Six Months: Step away from work and provide the best care
   

  

 and love to your little one.
   

  

 🎂 A Day Off on Your Birthday: We love to celebrate, so enjoy your birthday to the fullest with a day off each year!
   

  

 Diversity and inclusion is very important to us and we are committed to creating an inclusive work environment. We want to be a workplace where everyone’s perspectives and opinions are valued, and we are dedicated to creating opportunities for all employees to thrive and reach their full potential.
   

  

*This recruitment process consists of background checks via Verifiera as a review of previous public criminal records. The result is public information that is handled confidentially. This is mandatory for all recruitment processes at Instabee (Instabox/Budbee) in Sweden.*

title: Front End Developer with Quality Assurance skills for Charging Services, Customer Digitalization
description:
Scania is now undergoing a transformation from being a supplier of trucks, buses and engines to becoming a supplier of complete and sustainable transport solutions.
   

  

 The Charging Services Solutions team at Customer Digitalization Scania creates cutting-edge digital services powered by data from Battery Electric Vehicles. These services, accessible through My Scania and the Driver Mobile App, are designed to offer Scania customers a seamless, premium experience for all their charging needs.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 We think you are a passionate and tech-savvy front-end developer with a strong emphasis on quality, customer experience, and test automation. You have a strong sense of responsibility for leading the QA work from a front-end perspective both utilizing existing test automation tooling and implementing new frameworks and technologies. The ability to field-test Scania’s electrified vehicles together with our software and systems is something that makes You tick!
   

  

 If the above is true - join us in our mission to optimize daily work for our customers and reduce CO2 emissions through the power of digitalization, electrification, and connected vehicles!
   

  

**Your Responsibilities:**
* Develop responsive and user-friendly web applications using front-end technologies (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Angular, Vue.js)
* Implement and maintain automated front-end test suites (Jest, Cypress)
* Collaborate with UX/UI designers, back-end developers, and product owner
* Promote a quality-first mindset across the team, ensuring that QA is integrated into every stage of development
* Advocate for testing and quality assurance in planning sessions, code reviews, and daily stand-ups
* Ensure code quality by following best practices (modular design, clean code).
* Support other front-end developers by performing code reviews and engaging in pair programming
* Encourage a collaborative approach to identifying potential bugs or issues early, fostering a proactive QA culture
* Conduct manual and automated testing to ensure quality across browsers/devices
* Work on observability for our application with DataDog and other available tools
* Optimize front-end performance using tools like Lighthouse and WebPageTest
* Contribute to CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment
* Stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging front-end/testing technologies to drive forward the QA work
* Align development efforts with business goals and user needs


**Front-end Competencies**
* Proficiency in modern front-end development technologies & frameworks (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Angular, Vue.js)
* Expertise in front-end testing (Jest, Cypress, Mocha, Jasmine, Selenium etc.)
* Familiarity with Git and version control workflows.
* Experience with CI/CD tools (preferably GitLab)
* Performance testing and optimization (Lighthouse, WebPageTest)


**QA Competencies**
* Test-Driven Development (TDD) and Behavior-Driven Development (BDD) methologies
* Automated test suite design and implementation experience.
* Bug tracking and resolution using tools like JIRA
* Regression testing experience.


**Your way of working**
* Fluent English speaker with good communication and collaboration skills
* Understanding of business objectives and customer needs
* Risk management to prioritize testing and development
* Strong reporting skills to communicate quality metrics to stakeholder
* Critical thinking and problem-solving
* Adaptability and continuous learning
* Attention to detail in development and testing
* Strong time management and organization


**About The Team**
 You will join a vibrant and diverse team where collaboration, innovation, and fun go hand in hand. We thrive on teamwork, support each other through every challenge, and celebrate every success.
   

  

 As part of our multicultural crew, you'll have opportunities to grow, learn, and shape your career. We believe in empowering each other, and every new challenge within the industry we work in is a chance to expand your skills and take your professional journey to the next level.
   

  

 Plus, we make sure to enjoy the ride—because loving what you do is just as important as getting it done!
   

  

**For further information:**
 Please contact Flávia Alves (Head of Charging Solutions), flavia.x.alves@scania.com.
   

  

 A background check might be conducted for this position.

title: Junior Product Developer till svenskt modebolag!
description:
Här erbjuds en unik möjlighet att få in foten på ett stort internationellt modebolag som Junior Product Developer! I den här rollen stöttar du en Product Developer med produktutvecklingsprocessen. Sök tjänsten idag, och starta omgående!
 



  

**Plats :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 Marketing / Information / Media
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Omgående
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Konsultuppdrag
 



  

**Övrigt :**
 Möjlighet till distansarbete
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Vår kund är ett svenskt internationellt modebolag. Du kommer samarbeta tätt med en Product Developer på en av dess dedikerade avdelningar, samt med övriga på avdelningen och produktteamet. Ert mål är att säkerställa bästa möjliga produkter till bolagets kunder. Du kommer att vara en viktig länk mellan designers, mönsterkonstruktörer och planners genom hela processen. Vi ser därför att du trivs med administrativa uppgifter, och att du älskar att arbeta när ingen dag är den andra lik och tempot är högt.
 


  

  


 Som Jr Product Developer kommer du bland annat att:
 


  

  
* Stödja produktutvecklaren i utvecklingen av produkter och sortiment, hela tiden med kunden i fokus.
  
* Ta emot, granska och administrera prover från produktionen.
  
* Ha regelbunden kontakt med produktionen för att följa upp olika ärenden.
  
* Bidra med nya idéer, genom ditt intresse och engagemang för mode och textilier.
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Har eftergymnasial utbildning från Textilhögskolan/inom ekonomi/likvärdigt.
  
* Har minst ett års erfarenhet av Product Development inom dammode, garments.
  
* Har ett stort intresse för dammode, material och trender.
  
* Har mycket goda kunskaper i såväl svenska som engelska då både dessa språk används i det dagliga arbetet.
  
* Har förmåga att se möjligheter, förbättringar och enkla lösningar.
  
* Är strukturerad, organiserad och initiativtagande.
  
* Är en lagspelare med flexibel inställning.
  


  


  

**Övrig information**



  

  
* Start: omgående/augusti
  
* Uppdragslängd: 12 månader från och startdatum, med chans till fortsättning därefter. Avtal skrivs initialt på 6 månader.
  
* Placering: Stockholm city. Möjlighet till hybridarbete 1 dag/vecka.
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work. Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen.
   




**Bli en del av Academic Work**

 Som konsult för Academic Work erbjuds du stora möjligheter att växa professionellt och knyta värdefulla kontakter för framtiden. Du får en konsultchef som stöttar dig under resans gång och får ta del av olika förmåner, bl.a. möjlighet till kompetensutveckling i form av en grundläggande hållbarhetsutbildning.
 


 Läs mer om vårt konsulterbjudande här
   

**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Maja Cramne eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på stv1@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15105639

title: Full Stack Developer & Startup Founder (March 2025)
job_function: Information Technology, Business Development, and Strategy/Planning
company_industry: Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals
description:
**Note: This Opportunity Does Not Offer Employment, but rather an opportunity to build your own VC-backed startup!** 




  





**Who you are:** 




 You are a highly accomplished full-stack software developer with a demonstrated ability to deliver innovative solutions. Your exceptional programming skills and experience in building complex applications position you to tackle significant challenges within the tech industry. You possess a strong problem-solving aptitude and a passion for pioneering cutting-edge technologies. Driven to make a real impact, you're eager to leverage your expertise in building disruptive tech ventures.
 



  





**About Antler** 




 Antler is the world's most active venture capital firm, providing funding from pre-seed to Series C. We invest in Founders who seek to define our tomorrow and reshape the world we live in with groundbreaking technological innovation. Every year, we handpick the strongest Founders from more than 135,000 applicants across our 27 locations on the globe, which has led us to work with more than 7,000 founders to date and a portfolio of more than 1,000 startups.
 



  





**The Antler Founder Residency** 




 Join a dynamic cohort of 200+ highly motivated entrepreneurs for an immersive 12-week program. Visit our website for a detailed breakdown of how we'll support your startup launch.
 


* 12-Week full-time Immersive Journey: Kicking off March, 2025, in Stockholm.
* Co-Founder Discovery: In the first 10 weeks, collaborate with fellow Founders to find your co-founder(s).
* Pitch to Invest: Present your team and business idea to the Antler Investment Committee. Secure a net cash investment of EUR 100k for 10% equity.
* Accelerate Growth: If funded, we work closely with you to make your startup a success



  





**Program Details** 



* **Start Date:** 
 March 3rd, 2025
* **Location:** 
 Onsite at our Stockholm office
* **Compensation:** 
 While participants don't receive financial compensation during the program, pre-seed investment is available to jumpstart your venture.
* **Visa Sponsorship:** 
 Due to the non-employment nature of the program, visa sponsorship is unavailable.



  





**For our March 2025 cohort, we’re looking for someone who:** 



* Having the autonomy to develop sophisticated software solutions to address real-world challenges, merging ingenuity with functionality.
* Exceptional problem-solving and analytical skills, capable of breaking down complex issues and bringing structure into business cases
* Providing leadership, whether it’s directing a development team or managing comprehensive product delivery.
* You have an idea that you believe can solve a problem you are deeply interested in. You understand that you need co-pilots who share your vision and values.



  





**Application Process** 




 Our streamlined application process takes only 2-3 weeks:
 


1. Apply through our website.
2. Participate in an introductory interview.
3. Progress to an in-depth interview with our partners.
4. Receive a potential offer.



  





**Antler Success Stories** 




 Several companies built through the Antler program have received pre-seed investment and have gone on to secure significant funding rounds. Here are just a few examples:
 


* **Wingbits:** 
 A community-driven flight data tracking platform
* **Two:** 
 A comprehensive B2B payment suite simplifying sales for online and offline businesses.
* **Evyon:** 
 A developer of eco-friendly battery energy storage systems.
* **Glint Solar:** 
 Software accelerating the identification of optimal solar installation sites.
* **PerPlant:** 
 AI-powered sensor systems creating a gateway to sustainable agriculture.

title: BI Developer - Data Ingestion Specialist till Apollo
description:
* Är du riktigt vass på BI Utveckling & Data Ingestion samt älskar att resa på fritiden?
* Vill du bidra till att skapa den bästa kundresan & reseupplevelsen för våra kunder?
* Vill du arbeta i en familjär, varm och omtänksam företagskultur ihop med dedikerade och riktigt kompetenta medarbetare?


 Då är rollen som BI Developer - Data Ingestion Specialist på Apollo som klippt och skuren för dig, läs gärna vidare!
   

  

 Apollo söker nu en skicklig BI-utvecklare till vårt datalagerteam, som främst fokuserar på datainmatningsfasen. Den idealiska kandidaten kommer att spela en avgörande roll när det gäller att skapa och underhålla vår datapipeline, vilket säkerställer ett sömlöst dataflöde från olika källor till vårt Azure Databricks-informationslager.
   

  

**Bakgrund**
 För Apollo är utveckling lika viktigt som Grekland och världen. Att utveckla tjänster och produkter som ger våra slutkunder den bästa upplevelsen, innan, under och efter resan är ständigt i fokus för oss. Just nu arbetar vi med att byta ut vårt CMS och PIM till Contentful, samtidigt bygger vi en tydligare struktur där både utvecklare och produktägare ges än större befogenheter och ansvar för vår plattform.
   

  

 85% av Apollos försäljning sker online och vi lägger stor vikt vid att kontinuerligt förbättra kundupplevelsen genom att driva innovation som hjälper våra kunder att hitta, konfigurera och beställa sin drömresa. Våra utvecklingsteam tillsammans med våra produktägare och UX designers driver gemensamt utvecklingen av sitt område framåt, både på produktnivå såväl som tekniskt. Vi arbetar nära övriga avdelningar för att säkerställa att vi på bästa sätt nyttjar den långa och breda erfarenhet vi som organisation har om de resor vi erbjuder.
   

  

 Tjänsteplacering kommer att vara på huvudkontoret på Ynglingagatan i Stockholm, här sitter ca 170 av våra medarbetare varav 50 av dessa jobbar inom IT.
   

  

 Huvudsakliga ansvarsområden
   

  

* Designa, utveckla och underhålla datainmatningsprocesser från flera plattformar (AWS, Google osv.) och databaser (SQL Server, Oracle) till vår Azure Databricks-miljö.
* Skriva effektiva och skalbara Pythonscript och SQL-frågor för dataextraktion, transformation och inläsning (ETL).
* Samarbeta med tvärfunktionella team för att förstå datakrav och implementera lämpliga intagslösningar.
* Felsöka och optimera processer för datainmatning för förbättrad prestanda och tillförlitlighet.
* Hålla dig uppdaterad med best practice och den senaste utvecklingen inom datainmatningsteknik.


 Nödvändiga färdigheter
   

  

* Minst 2-3 års erfarenhet av nedan, gärna mer
* Starka kunskaper i Python-programmering och SQL.
* Omfattande erfarenhet av datainmatning från olika källor, inklusive molnplattformar och relationsdatabaser.
* Gedigen förståelse för ETL-processer och datalagringskoncept.
* Kunskaper om Azure Databricks och andra molnbaserade dataplattformar.
* Utmärkt problemlösningsförmåga och analytisk förmåga.
* God Svenska och Engelska i tal och skrift


 Meriteriande färdigheter
   

  

* Erfarenhet av datamodellering och övergripande datalagerprocesser.


 Personlighet
   

  

 Då utvecklingsteamen arbetar verksamhetsnära är förmågan till goda relationer samt stort intresse för övriga delar av Apollo viktigt. Apollo andas och lever tillsammans, lagandan är tydlig och man utmanar gärna varandra positivt för att nå framgång. Branschen och Apollo är snabbrörliga, agila och så även du. Vidare är du en nyfiken social och kreativ lagspelare, kompetent, kommunikativ och stolt över ditt yrkeskunnande. Du delar med dig av din kunskap, är bra på att ge och ta konstruktiv feedback samt mån om att arbeta med kontinuerlig förbättring av såväl dig själv som verksamheten.
   

  

 Vårt erbjudande
   

  

 Apollo erbjuder en stimulerande och kreativ arbetsmiljö med varierande arbetsuppgifter som du har stor möjlighet att påverka. Vi har en platt organisation som uppmuntrar samarbete, kommunikation och delande av idéer inom och mellan olika avdelningar på Apollo. Vi erbjuder en arbetsplats där affären är viktigt samtidigt som vi har roligt och en bra balans mellan jobb och privatliv. Frågar vi våra utvecklare så beskrivs vi som en organisation där du uppmanas och har utrymme att lyfta idéer kring hemsidan eller teknikval. Vi ser också till att faktiskt testa nya tekniker vilket gör att vi ständigt utvecklas och utmanas, tillsammans i teamen! Utöver detta kommer du givetvis att erbjudas riktigt bra deals på resor utöver redan schyssta förmåner!
   

  

 Kontakt & Ansökan
   

  

 I denna rekrytering samarbetar vi med Aliby - The Pink Company. Då intervjuer och urval sker löpande ber vi dig att inte vänta med att skicka in ditt CV. Vid intresse vänligen kontakta ansvarig rekryteringskonsult. Omar Burazerovic 0728–897441 / Lars Ohlson 0705-888175.
   

  

 Om Apollo
   

  

 Apollo är en branschledande researrangör som underlättat för skandinaver att komma ut i världen, först med resor till Grekland till att nu kunna erbjuda hela världen till våra kunder. Vi gör det genom vårt charterbolag Apollo, men även genom våra systerbolag Xtravel, Golf Plaisir, Out of Bounds och Lime Travel. Med mer än 35 år i branschen så fortsätter vi att växa och söker därför efter fler kompetenta IT-medarbetare som tillsammans med oss vill skapa resebranschens bästa kundresa, oavsett om den sker digitalt eller på en sandstrand i Grekland. Sedan 2015 är Apollo en del av den privatägda tyska koncernen REWE med över 300 000 medarbetare. REWE är stora inom dagligvaruhandel, sällanköp, reseindustrin, med mera. En stark ägare som även har fler andra resebolag i Europa inom koncernen som vi samarbetar med.

title: Senior Backend .Net developer with CM experience| SEB, Solna
description:
Are you passionate about new technology and making a difference? Join our digital transformation!
   

  

 SEB is more than just a bank with an IT function. We are a progressive tech company powered by innovation and fueled by collaboration. From COBOL to AI and everything in between, we offer you an impressive tech stack and several technology paths. Together we're innovating for a sustainable society and building the tech arena of the future, a welcoming space for everyone. Are you ready to take on a new challenge? If so, you'll be interested in this opportunity!
   

  

**About the role:**
 As a developer at SEB you will be helping us to create a high quality product with focus on customer value. You will work within an agile, DevSecOps oriented, environment and be the teams Configuration Management expert. Together we are creating a new payment solution to improve the experience for our customers. You will develop mainly new applications and services using a modern tech stack including .Net, Docker, Kubernetes (OpenShift), SQL Server, Github and more. Together with the team you will work closely with the product owner, architects, business analysts, E2E testers and other stakeholders to build and run high performing well designed solutions.
   

  

**To thrive in this role, we believe you have:**
* Solid experience within .Net/C# with a backend focus
* Interest in working with configuration management
* Experience of working with APIs, containers and microservices
* Experience from working with agile methods
* Confidence in both the Swedish and English languages, both written and oral
* Experience with GitHub Actions, Angular and MS SQL are meritorious


**What we offer:**
* Agile and modern ways of working
* A flat hierarchy and openness to share ideas, opinions and points of views
* Extensive training and learning opportunities


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
 Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 31th of October 2024. If you have questions about the position, please contact hiring manager Stefan Holst at Stefan.holst @seb.se
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEBhere** 
 : www.sebgroup.com/techcareers
   

  

 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.

title: Software Engineer within Azure
description:
**Varför är detta jobb något för dig?** 




 För att du gillar tanken på att arbeta som ett produktbolag samtidigt som du vill ha variationen som kommer med att vara konsult. Det handlar om att leverera produkter och tjänster som ett team. Kärnan i vardagen är kunskapsdelning. All kod granskas, snabba beslutsvägar och stor frihet ger dig möjligheten att utveckla dina färdigheter. Teamet är självstyrande, så hur problemet löses är upp till dig. Du och ditt team väljer teknologierna som behövs för att lösa uppgiften, inte tvärtom. I slutändan handlar det om att vi vill ge dig möjligheten att fokusera på det du älskar mest – att lösa tekniska problem.
 



**Bygg en karriär du kan vara stolt över** 




 Alla projekt, oavsett om det handlar om självkörande fordon, medicintekniska lösningar för att bekämpa cancer, eller en streamingtjänst, har en sak gemensamt: de är alla molnbaserade lösningar och produkter. Mob programming, kodgranskning, tech talks, hackathons och certifieringar är några av de sätt vi kan bli ännu bättre tillsammans. Det är vad det handlar om – att uppnå saker tillsammans. Du är omgiven av människor som bryr sig. Inte bara om projektet och teknologin, utan också om varandra. Vi gör det som ett team, och det är så vi tar oss framåt.
 



**Arbetsuppgifter:** 



* Designa, utveckla och optimera backend-lösningar med fokus på Microsoft Azure.
* Implementera microservices för att säkerställa skalbara och effektiva system.
* Designa och implementera RESTful eller GraphQL API.
* Arbeta med relationsdatabaser (t.ex. MySQL) och NoSQL-lösningar (t.ex. MongoDB).
* Samarbeta med front-end utvecklare, data engineers och andra för att skapa integrerade system.
* Bidra med nya idéer och håll dig uppdaterad om de senaste teknologierna.



**Kvalifikationer:** 



* Examen i datavetenskap eller liknande område.
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av backend-utveckling (Java, NodeJS, .Net, C#).
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Microsoft Azure.
* Erfarenhet av containerteknologier (Docker, Kubernetes).
* Kunskap om CI/CD-processer och verktyg.
* Goda kommunikationsfärdigheter och vana att arbeta i team.
* Flytande i svenska och engelska.



**Vad vi erbjuder** 




 På Knightec får du arbeta i en innovativ och stödjande miljö med projekt som gör skillnad. Vi värderar mångfald och samarbete och tror på att utveckla både produkter och människor. Med över 40 olika nationaliteter och en hybrid arbetsmodell som främjar flexibilitet, erbjuder vi en dynamisk arbetsplats med balans mellan arbete och privatliv. Här får du möjligheten att växa både personligen och professionellt, med stöd från vårt team och genom spännande projekt för ledande företag.
 



**En spännande resa med Knightec Group** 




 Vi på Knightec går nu samman med vårt systerbolag Semcon och bildar
 **Knightec Group** 
 . Tillsammans blir vi den ledande aktören i norra Europa inom produkt- och digital tjänsteutveckling – hur häftigt är inte det? Vårt gemensamma erbjudande blir både bredare och djupare, vilket gör att vi kan ta oss an stora, strategiska kundprojekt på högsta nivå av innovation och komplexitet. För våra medarbetare innebär detta fantastiska möjligheter till kompetensutveckling och karriärvägar. Låter detta som platsen för dig? Häng med oss på denna spännande resa!

title: System Developer | RaySearch Laboratories
description:
RaySearch has several cancer care software products, and we are now looking to add more talented developers to their RayCare product.
 


 About RayCare
 
 RayCare is a client-server application that runs on premises at many clinics all over the world. RayCare takes care of and helps clinical staff to coordinate their work at the clinic. For example, workflow management, patient chart details and treatment management. RayCare is an innovative oncology information system (OIS) designed to support the complex challenges of modern oncology clinics. It is developed to streamline workflows in cancer clinics to facilitate efficient care faster to more patients. RayCare is used by all staff at the clinic, e.g., physicians, physicists, treatment planners etc. and is used in all steps of patient care, from registration to radiation treatment at the treatment machine and for treatment follow-up. RayCare is integrated with RayStation and its treatment tools but also with external products and supports communication via HL7 as well as DICOM.
 


**Responsibilities** 

 As a System Developer in RayCare, you will be part of designing and implementing a robust and modern oncology information system. RaySearch value problem-solving skills and a structured approach, but also a willingness to collaborate and learn from your peers. RayCare has high demands on sustainable software development, with a focus on excellent code quality and maintaining best practices. Your contributions will help ensure that our software meets the high standards required for improving cancer care, and we encourage open communication and teamwork to find the best solutions.
 


**Your profile** 

 You have excellent analytic skills, you identify different components of problems, see the connections between them and understand the impact of various proposed solutions. You take responsibility and check that nothing is left to chance or missed when implementing new functionality. You take pride in delivering code with superior quality.
 


**Requirements:** 
* M.Sc. in Engineering Physics, Computer Science or equivalent academic degree
* Minimum seven years of .NET development experience with complex products
* Highly skilled in C#.NET
* Knowledge of event-sourcing and CQRS
* Experience of messaging frameworks
* Experience with client-server based systems
* Knowledge of domain-driven design


**Meriting:** 
* Experience of working in an agile environment
* Experience from the MedTech-industry or other regulated industries
* Experience of framework development of mission critical systems
* Databases such as SQL Server
* Front-end development with frameworks such as WPF and/or Web technologies such as TypeScript, Angular, etc.


**RaySearch office** 

 RaySearch office is located in Hagastaden, Stockholm's Life Science Hub, with a modern and creative work environment. They offer a private gym, yoga, and social activities such as table tennis, foosball, and regular after-work events. Their bistro serves a fantastic lunch buffet, and every day we provide morning fika , as well as afternoon snacks. RaySearch´s rooftop terrace offers a stunning view of Stockholm.
 


 About RaySearch
   


 RaySearch develops innovative software solutions to improve cancer care. About 1000 clinics in more than 40 countries use RaySearch software to improve treatments and quality of life for patients. RaySearch was founded in 2000 and is listed on Nasdaq Stockholm. The headquarters is located in Stockholm, with subsidiaries in the US, Europe, Asia and Australia & New Zealand. Today we are more than 380 employees with a common vision of improving cancer care with innovative software. Our great staff is crucial for their success and they offer a fantastic working environment in modern offices, flexibility and good opportunities for development. They believe in equal opportunities, value diversity and work actively to prevent discrimination.
   





**Om Senterprise**
*Senterprise Sverige AB är ett ledande nischat IT-rekryteringsbolag med expertis inom rekrytering av erfarna systemutvecklare. Vi hjälper idag några av Sverige mest attraktiva arbetsgivare med IT-rekrytering, uthyrning av rekryteringskonsulter samt IT-konsulter.*
*Läs vidare på* 
*www.senterprise.se*

title: Data Scientist & Startup Founder (March 2025)
job_function: Information Technology, Business Development, and Strategy/Planning
company_industry: Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals
description:
**This ad is not for an employment, but an opportunity to build a VC-backed startup from the ground up.** 




  





**Who you are:** 




 You are a highly skilled technical professional with a proven track record in developing innovative solutions. Your strong programming abilities and experience in building complex algorithms enable you to address critical challenges within the tech industry. You are a proactive individual with a passion for progress, driven to make a significant impact through cutting-edge technological advancements.
 



  





**The Antler Founder Residency** 




 Join a dynamic cohort of 200+ highly motivated entrepreneurs for an immersive 12-week program. Visit our website for a detailed breakdown of how we'll support your startup launch.
 


* 12-Week full-time Immersive Journey: Kicking off March, 2025, in Stockholm.
* Co-Founder Discovery: In the first 10 weeks, collaborate with fellow Founders to find your co-founder(s).
* Pitch to Invest: Present your team and business idea to the Antler Investment Committee. Secure a net cash investment of EUR 100k for 10% equity.
* Accelerate Growth: If funded, we work closely with you to make your startup a success!



  





**Program Details** 



* **Start Date:** 
 March 3rd, 2025
* **Location:** 
 Onsite at our Stockholm office
* **Compensation:** 
 While participants don't receive financial compensation during the program, pre-seed investment is available to jumpstart your venture.
* **Visa Sponsorship:** 
 Due to the non-employment nature of the program, visa sponsorship is unavailable.



  





**For our March 2025 cohort, we're looking for someone who:** 



* Excel in Data Science, Machine Learning, or AI, with a knack for advancing technology.
* Can unearth insights from intricate data, leading in ML methodologies.
* Embrace the challenge of merging diverse data for revolutionary models.
* Are adept at prototyping innovative solutions that pave the way for real-world applications.
* Navigate product development with strategic foresight and precision.

**Application Process** 




 Our streamlined application process takes only 2-3 weeks:
 


1. Apply through our website.
2. Participate in an introductory interview.
3. Progress to an in-depth interview with our partners.
4. Receive a potential offer.

 A community-driven flight data tracking platform

 A comprehensive B2B payment suite simplifying sales for online and offline businesses.

 A developer of eco-friendly battery energy storage systems.

 Software accelerating identification of optimal solar installation sites.

 AI-powered sensor systems creating a gateway to sustainable agriculture.

description:
