title: Business Controller
description:
Are you ready to make an impact in a dynamic organization as our new Business controller? We at Profoto are building our new finance team and are looking for an ambitious talent, ready to grow with us!
 



  





**Who We Are Looking For:** 




 We are seeking a motivated Business controller who is eager to take on a role with responsibility for driving and ensuring profitable growth. As a publicly listed company on Nasdaq since 2021, we operate in a highly dynamic environment that requires adherence to formal regulations but also offers significant opportunities for learning and growth.
 



  





 You will be based at our headquarters in Sundbyberg, Stockholm, with a flexible work arrangement, reporting directly to the CFO. You will collaborate closely with the Group Accounting Manager, Group Financial controller, and Finance BP & IR to support our financial strategy and performance.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Manage ongoing financial processes, including forecasting, reporting, and setting financial targets together with the CFO.
* Lead efforts to analyze, evaluate, and enhance Profoto’s performance, identifying key areas for improvement.
* Responsible for preparing material for Management review and Board of directors reporting and assisting in the preparation of consolidated reports for both internal and external stakeholders.
* Conduct in-depth analysis of quarterly reports to provide actionable insights.
* Lead the financial control process, ensuring compliance with the established framework, including cost control.
* Serve as the owner of the BI system "Insikt", ensuring data quality and driving development and maintenance projects.
* Assist various departments in sales and cost follow-up and planning to ensure profitability.
* Lead the annual report process, acting as project manager from start to finish.
* Provide administrative support for IR activities, such as maintaining logbooks and preparing press releases.



  





**Requirements:** 



* A professional who thrives in a high-performing and ambitious culture.
* A strong desire to work in a fast-paced international environment.
* A master’s degree in a relevant field with some experience or a strong interest in finance.
* A passion for using, developing, and maintaining business intelligence tools (experience with "Insikt" is a plus).
* Fluent in both Swedish and English, with excellent written and oral communication skills.



  





**Your Profile:** 




 We are looking for someone who thrives in an environment where ambition and achievement are valued. You are eager to learn, grow, and contribute alongside our talented team. You have an analytical mindset with a passion for numbers and data visualization.
 



  





**Why Join Profoto – The Light Shaping Company?** 




 If you believe you have what it takes to become our next Business Controller, we encourage you to apply! Please submit your application, including your CV and academic transcripts. Interviews will be conducted on a continuous basis, so apply today!
 



  





**What We Offer:** 




 At Profoto, innovation is at the heart of everything we do, making us the preferred choice for the world's leading photographers. Our culture is creative, entrepreneurial, forward-thinking, and agile. We seek out the best and brightest to help drive us forward, providing early opportunities for responsibility and growth.
 



  





 We are committed to growth—both our own and that of our employees. We offer a high-energy, high-quality environment where you can develop and thrive, surrounded by passionate colleagues who love what they do. Our values include freedom, trust, coaching, leadership, and a focus on individual development, making Profoto a place where you can truly shine.

title: Internship - Corporate Governance Research - Nordic Market
description:
Let’s be #BrilliantTogether
   

  

 ISS STOXX empowers investors and companies to build for long-term and sustainable growth by providing high-quality data, analytics, and insight. We are committed to positively impacting the environment and society through our market-leading solutions and leading by example. Our clients have long turned to ISS STOXX to apply their corporate governance views, identify environmental, social, and governance risks, and manage their global proxy voting needs.
   

  

**Need a refresher on what Corporate Governance and Proxy Voting are?**
* Corporate governance is the system by which companies are directed and controlled. Boards of directors are responsible for the governance of their companies. The shareholders’ role in governance is developing continuously with investors increasingly acting as responsible stewards and taking into account a wide range of ESG topics. This may include consideration such as the appointment of directors, approving executive remuneration schemes, M&A, and considerations of companies' climate transition plans.
* Shareholders are invited by public companies they have shares in to vote on a wide range of topics during annual general meetings. They can delegate their voting power to a representative, who will then be considered a proxy. Here at ISS STOXX, we provide the research, insight and recommendations for our clients to make informed voting decisions.


**Enter the world of corporate governance and responsible investment and jumpstart your career by gaining exposure to the fundamental affairs of businesses and economies on a global scale.**
**What You Will Do**
 ISS STOXX seeks a pool of talented and self-motivated research interns for February 2025. Our interns will be assigned to a dynamic regional market (Nordic) and guided by our experienced analysts.
   

  

 As a Corporate Governance Research Intern, you will become an integral part of the team with the crucial role of helping deliver analysis, data, research, and vote recommendations to our institutional shareholder clients, such as pension funds or other asset managers. The internship will take place during “proxy voting season”. Our goal is to support our clients in making informed voting decisions on that occasion.
   

  

 As part of the ISS STOXX team, you will, along with others, analyze publicly available materials of listed companies. Focus will be on governance structures, executive compensation and performance of the publicly listed companies and providing investors with the appropriate vote recommendations.
   

  

 By leveraging analyst expertise on corporate governance, colored by constantly developing market trends, standards, client expectations and practices you and the team will prepare reports detailing the analyses and explaining why a particular vote recommendation was given.
   

  

**What You Will Bring To ISS STOXX**
* Fluency in English (both spoken and written).
* A minimum one of the following languages to a native standard: Danish, Finnish, Icelandic, Norwegian or Swedish.
* A relevant bachelor's or master's degree in Economics, Business, Finance, Law, or Political Sciences (or in the final stages of obtaining such a degree).
* A prior experience in a relevant area will be considered as an advantage.
* A strong analytical ability, numeracy, strong oral and written communication skills.
* A strong reader with the ability to assimilate large quantities of information, work independently and take initiative while also being a team player.
* An organized and structured mind that can reason logically under given parameters.
* An interest in ESG, capital markets and business.


**What You Will Gain From This Internship**
* Develop a deeper understanding within the world of corporate governance and long-term responsible investment.
* Receive in-depth training and specific skills to help fulfil your career aspirations.
* Expand your know-how and contribute significantly to client work that has real-world impact.
* Make a difference and perform in a workplace of integrity and transparency.
* An ability to make nuanced, principled, and well-argued decisions based on a framework of rules and practices.
* Hands-on experience working with a global market leader.


 This internship is remunerated 26,000 SEK gross per month + additional benefits and will run for 4 months, from the 3rd of February 2025 to the 30th of May 2025. Interns are required to work from the ISS STOXX office 5 days a week and must be based in the country of employment from Day 1 of the internship.
   

  

**Interested in this great learning opportunity?**
 Apply online by sending your CV in English.
   

  

 Please note that due to the great number of applications we receive, we can only respond to selected candidates.
   

  

 To all recruitment agencies: ISS STOXX does not accept unsolicited CVs/Resumes. Please do not forward CVs/Resumes to any ISS STOXX employee, location, or website. ISS STOXX is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited CVs/Resumes.
   

  

 #INTERNSHIP
   

  

**What You Can Expect From Us**
 Our people are the moving force behind ISS STOXX. We are dedicated to hiring the best, most talented people in our industry and empowering them with the resources and support to enhance their career, health, financial and personal well-being.
   

  

 We are committed to fostering, cultivating, and preserving a culture of diversity and inclusion. We are invested in our people and are working every day to ensure a diverse, equitable, and inclusive workplace.
   

  

 Let’s empower, collaborate, and inspire one another.
   

  

 Let’s be
 **#BrilliantTogether** 
 .
   

  

**About ISS STOXX**
 ISS STOXX GmbH is a leading provider of research and technology solutions for the financial market. Established in 1985, we offer top-notch benchmark and custom indices globally, helping clients identify investment opportunities and manage portfolio risks. Our services cover corporate governance, sustainability, cyber risk, and fund intelligence. Majority-owned by Deutsche Börse Group, ISS STOXX has over 3,400 professionals in 33 locations worldwide, serving around 6,400 clients, including institutional investors and companies focused on ESG, cyber, and governance risk. Clients trust our expertise to make informed decisions for their stakeholders' benefit.
   

  

 Founded in 1985 as Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS) Inc., ISS Governance is a leading global provider of independent and objective shareholder meeting research and recommendations, providing multiple voting policy choices as well as end-to-end workflow solutions for institutional investors. More than 1,600 clients worldwide utilize ISS Governance’s actionable expertise to help them make informed investment stewardship decisions, and to help them manage their voting responsibilities. Covering over 50,000 meetings annually, ISS Governance leverages its extensive global footprint, deep experience, high quality data and analysis, unified client support, and technology infrastructure to continuously evolve and extend its innovative suite of solutions to meet clients’ evolving portfolio, fiduciary, and stewardship requirements.
   

  

 Visit our website: https://www.issgovernance.com
   

  

 View additional open roles: https://www.issgovernance.com/join-the-iss-team/
   

  

 The Swedish Confederation of Professional Associations (SACO) is a politically independent central organization for 22 unions comprising university graduates in Sweden. You are welcome to contact the local representatives of SACO at ISS-Ethix on SACO@iss-esg.com. However, note that no applications sent to this e-mail address will be accepted.
   

  

*Institutional Shareholder Services (“ISS”) is committed to fostering, cultivating, and preserving a culture of diversity and inclusion. It is our policy to prohibit discrimination or harassment against any applicant or employee on the basis of race, color, ethnicity, creed, religion, sex, age, height, weight, citizenship status, national origin, social origin, sexual orientation, gender identity or gender expression, pregnancy status, marital status, familial status, mental or physical disability, veteran status, military service or status, genetic information, or any other characteristic protected by law (referred to as “protected status”). All activities including, but not limited to, recruiting and hiring, recruitment advertising, promotions, performance appraisals, training, job assignments, compensation, demotions, transfers, terminations (including layoffs), benefits, and other terms, conditions, and privileges of employment, are and will be administered on a non-discriminatory basis, consistent with all applicable federal, state, and local requirements.*

title: IT SERVICE MANAGEMENT- SPECIALIST
description:
**IT Service Management Specialist**
 As an IT Service Management Specialist at SAS, you will be at the core of our IT Service Management Function responsible for Configuration Management and Change Enablement, you will work closely with our Digital & IT team, ensuring that business priorities are supported by robust IT services and that operational continuity is maintained.
   

  

**Challenges You Will Work On**
**Configuration Management**
 Manage CI’s and CI Lifecycle Process
   

  

 Maintain accurate, reliable, and up-to-date records of Business Services and IT Assets in ServiceNow CMDB. This ensures that all components required to deliver services, such as hardware, software, networks, applications, and documentation are identified, controlled, tracked, and managed throughout their lifecycle.
   

  

* Provides visibility, control, and understanding of an organization’s IT assets.
* Plays a critical role in risk reduction, compliance, and efficient IT service management.
* Supports better decision-making across multiple ITIL practices, from Change Management to Incident Management.
* Enhances service quality, continuity, and operational efficiency, directly impacting the organization’s ability to deliver reliable services to its customers.
* Understanding critical business processes and functional for efficient collaboration with stakeholders.
* Maintain strong relationships with both internal and external teams, ensuring seamless communication and collaboration.
* Keep the service registry (CMDB) and knowledge base up to date to support the incident management process.


**Change Enablement**
 Configuration Management role goes hand in hand with managing changes, in SAS we have hybrid environment including traditional Apps and Services along with product teams planning their development and release cycle as per DevOps Pipelines.
   

  

* Driving change success by preparing, equipping, and supporting individuals and teams to thrive through change.
* Focus on reducing potential risks to the business in advance by planning changes and ensuring appropriate resources are available to reduce the risk of major incidents and unforeseen problems.
* Collaborate closely with other key stakeholders to ensure changes align with corporate strategic objectives.
* Prepare for business readiness to ensure business is ready for planned changes.


**Be part of IT Service Management at SAS**
 Supporting Incident & Problem Management Function
   

  

 Close collaboration with Incident and Problem management function to strive for Improving service quality and facilitating continuous improvement.
   

  

* It is possible to be part of the Major Incident Management on-call rotation, which is compensated separately.
* Manage incidents based on the Incident management process, ensuring that incidents are resolved within agreed SLAs and communicated properly to stakeholders. Coordinating resolution efforts and leading emergency response teams during critical IT disruptions.
* Participate in root cause analysis (RCA) and follow up on blameless postmortems for recurring incidents, ensuring long-term fixes are implemented.


**To Be Successful, We Believe You Have**
* 3-5 years of experience in IT Service Management, with expertise in Configuration and Change Management
* In-depth knowledge of ITIL (v4) processes, especially Incident, Change, and Problem Management. ITIL certification is a plus.
* A service-oriented mindset.
* Self-driven and able to drive process improvements and change.
* Drive strategic initiatives and be able to work with multiple stakeholders across SAS Digital & IT.
* A curiosity to learn the airline business and the IT systems used to support SAS.
* A pride in doing a good job together with colleagues.
* Good analytical skills.
* Excellent communication skills in English


**Is this you? If so, come fly with us!**
 If you have questions about this position, you are warmly welcome to contact Ujjwal Prakash, Head of IT Ops & IT SecOps, at ujjwal.prakash@sas.se. Please send your CV as soon as possible. Interviews are conducted continuously, and the position may be filled before the application deadline (2024-10-24). We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

**Why SAS ?**
**Benefits**
 At SAS, we offer extensive opportunities for professional development in an international, fast-paced working environment. We are dedicated to the continuous growth of our employees. Working with us comes with a variety of benefits, including:
   

  

* Travel Perks: Enjoy discounted travel opportunities around the world with SAS.
* Health & Wellness: Access to health and wellness benefits, including a newly renovated gym with complimentary classes such as CrossFit and yoga.
* Discounts: Receive discounts from a wide range of brands, as well as on transportation to and from airports, airport shops, hotels, and car rentals.
* Work Environment: Our office location in Frösundavik offers a vibrant workspace with a restaurant, café, and easy access to outdoor activities in Hagaparken and Brunnsviken. Engage in running, tennis, outdoor gym sessions, kayaking, and stand-up paddling with equipment available free of charge.
* Convenient Commute: Benefit from a non-stop bus service connecting our office to Central Station, Solna station, and commuter trains, alongside a network of cycle paths.

title: IT Infrastructure Engineer
description:
At Tobii, we want to empower businesses and professionals with revolutionary insights into human behavior using the powers of eye tracking and attention computing. We are already making it, and we want to leverage further. We need people who are modern product thinkers, have an eye for technology, and beyond ready to amaze customers.
   

  

 Based at our HQ in Stockholm, you will play a key role as our new
 **IT Infrastructure Engineer** 
 , ensuring optimal performance, security, and availability of our network and server infrastructure. You will manage and maintain both physical and virtual IT environments, ensure seamless and secure connectivity across on-premises and cloud systems, and support our most critical IT operations.
   

  

 You will be the technical owner responsible for the design and architecture of the physical infrastructure (servers and networks), hybrid AD, and hybrid Exchange.
   

  

**Ready to take on this role** 
**? Here's what your day or week could look like:**
* Drive, maintain, and develop global and local network infrastructure: oversee routers, switches, firewalls, and wireless networks, following security best practices
* Administer hybrid environments: handle Active Directory architecture, Microsoft Entra ID, Conditional Access policies, and MFA
* Oversee cloud and on-premises environments: manage public and private cloud platforms (Azure, AWS, VMware), maintain Windows and Linux servers, and monitor backups
* Maintain VPNs and firewall policies: manage IPSEC VPNs, Client VPN configurations, and firewall rules for remote locations and partners
* Ensure server and storage integrity: maintain on-premises servers and storage systems, including remote administration with Lights Out technology
* Manage network security: monitor IDS systems, handle alerts, and contribute to security policies and risk management
* Troubleshoot infrastructure issues: provide 2nd/3rd line ServiceDesk support and resolve network-related incidents
* Operate enterprise WiFi and wired networks: manage wired 802.1x and WiFi networks for reliable connectivity
* Supplier relationship management: set technical requirements for, and build and maintain relationships with suppliers


**To be successful in this role, we would love if you have:**
* 5+ years of solid experience in network architecture and management
* Bachelor's degree in Network Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology
* Proven experience with enterprise-level network design and multi-site deployments
* Hands-on experience with network services and protocols (NPS, Radius, DHCP, DNS, TCP/IP)
* Expertise in configuring and managing switches, routers, firewalls, and VPNs
* Proficiency with network security and monitoring tools, including intrusion detection/prevention systems (IDS/IPS)
* Experience with hybrid cloud networking and integration of on-premises networks with cloud platforms (Azure, AWS, VMware)
* Excellent communication skills both in Swedish and English for collaborating effectively with diverse teams, including both technical and non-technical members
* A merit if you have related certifications (e.g., CCNA/CCNP, CompTIA Network+, VMware, Azure/AWS certifications)
* Driver's license would be preferred


**You are a person with:**
* Strong analytical and problem solving skills to tackle complex network challenges and troubleshooting
* Independent and team-oriented mindset with a customer-focused approach
* Flexible and adaptable to changes, embracing new challenges
* Ability to manage multiple projects and prioritize tasks effectively
* Willingness to learn and stay updated with evolving technologies, industry trends and advancements


****Sounds like you?****
 We are curious about you! Let us know about your background, experiences and where you’re heading.  Due to GDPR, we will only review those applications directed to our career page - so please submit your resume or LinkedIn profile through it!
   

  

**Tobii is the global leader in eye tracking**
 A position we earned through our passion for technology and our ambition to create tech for a better future. Our journey began over 20 years ago when we delivered the world’s first plug-and-play eye tracker. Since then, we’ve been on a mission to build technology that understands human attention and intent.
   

  

 Headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden, Tobii covers the global market with offices in Belgium, China, Germany, Ireland, Japan, Switzerland, Romania, Taiwan, the UK, and the US.

title: HEAD OF IT SECURITY
description:
**Head of IT Security**
 As the Head of IT Security at SAS you will be responsible for our IT security & compliance department. It is a leader role that is expected to drive the overall IT security agenda, working closely with the members of the Digital & IT leadership team. Our view is that the Head of IT security needs to collaborate deeply with the other departments, setting requirements and policies but also ensuring that the teams get the practical support they need to keep our environment secure together with the IT security resources.
   

  

 You will play a key role in driving and implementing security best practices, managing the 24/7 security operations center and ensuring that we are compliant to the relevant security standards.
   

  

**About The Team**
 Digital & IT is the organization responsible for all development, maintenance and operations of applications and technology services within SAS. The setup is a mix between in-house development, COTS products and SaaS solutions. A key focus is also on how we are a good partner to our colleagues around SAS on technology related topics
   

  

**Challenges You Will Work On**
* Managing our overall cyber security strategy and governance framework covering both traditional ITIL based service delivery and modern DevOps ways of working
* Ensure an efficient risk management framework to ensure that SAS understands their cyber security/ IT risks and work to make it a natural part of our daily business
* Manage the central security team and ensure that the teams across digital & IT get the support and knowledge they need to develop and operate secure solutions
* Continuously improve and evolve our 24/7 security operations center to ensure that we can act on the threats towards our environment
* Be responsible and evolve the CSMS to ensure that we are compliant with the different regulations (NIS2, Part-IS etc.)
* Be an advocate of Security in the organization, creating community around security topics and adopting security best practices across the organization.
* Collaborate on topics related to disaster recovery, threat modeling exercises, and other security-related activities across the organization


**To Be Successful, We Believe You Have**
* Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, Software Engineering, or relevant experience.
* Proven experience (min. 10 years) in IT security roles, with a strong understanding of cybersecurity principles, protocols, and technologies.
* Leadership experience
* Experience with security tools and technologies, such as SIEM solutions, endpoint protection platforms, identity and access management systems, and network security appliances.
* Hands-on experience with cloud security practices, cloud well architected framework, and security best practices used in cloud environments.
* Knowledge of relevant regulatory frameworks like NIS2, Part-IS GDPR and industry standards (e.g., NIST, ISO 27001/2) and what it takes to comply.
* Effective communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.
* Strong problem-solving abilities, pro-active, data-driven mindset to identify the areas
* Drive initiatives in collaboration with the team members, other security representatives and stakeholders.
* A team player, positive attitude, helping and coaching team members.
* Passionate about IT security and thrive on the dynamic challenges posed by the ever-evolving cyber threat landscape.


**Is this you? If so, come fly with us!**
 Please send your CV as soon as possible. Interviews are conducted continuously, and the position may be filled before the application deadline (2024-10-28). We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

**Why SAS?**
**Benefits**
 At SAS, we offer extensive opportunities for professional development in an international, fast-paced working environment. We are dedicated to the continuous growth of our employees. Working with us comes with a variety of benefits, including:
   

  

* Travel Perks: Enjoy discounted travel opportunities around the world with SAS.
* Health & Wellness: Access to health and wellness benefits, including a newly renovated gym with complimentary classes such as CrossFit and yoga.
* Discounts: Receive discounts from a wide range of brands, as well as on transportation to and from airports, airport shops, hotels, and car rentals.
* Work Environment: Our office location in Frösundavik offers a vibrant workspace with a restaurant, café, and easy access to outdoor activities in Hagaparken and Brunnsviken. Engage in running, tennis, outdoor gym sessions, kayaking, and stand-up paddling with equipment available free of charge.
* Convenient Commute: Benefit from a non-stop bus service connecting our office to Central Station, Solna station, and commuter trains, alongside a network of cycle paths.

title: IT Teknisk Testare
company_industry: Civil Engineering, Software Development, and Financial Services
description:
Vi på ICA Bankens IT har det spännande uppdraget att förverkliga ICA Bankens digitala resa. Vi implementerar automatiserade tester i hög grad och fortsätter att förbättra och utöka mängden och har påbörjat resan mot CI/CD och DevOps mindset. Är du nyfiken på oss? Då skulle du passa perfekt i vårt Test-Team! Vi söker nu en erfaren testare till våra kontor i Stockholm (Solna) och Borås.
   

  

 Om jobbet
   

  

 Teamet ansvarar idag för systemtester inklusive regressionstester från klient till bassystem där det sista check innan release genomförs. Vi är även stöd till verksamheten i acceptanstester- och vi jobbar med både manuell och automatiserad testning. Vårt team är en mycket viktig komponent för att upprätthålla en hög kvalité och tillgänglighet både till ICA Bankens kunder och personal. Vi jobbar både med nyutveckling och förvaltning där vi testar webb, mobilapp, integrationstjänster samt interna banksystem.
   

  

 Är du den vi söker?
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har 3+ års erfarenhet inom test och kvalitetssäkring samt högskoleutbildning inom relevant område eller motsvarande erfarenhet. Du har förståelse för olika typer och nivåer av tester, testplanering, samt rapportering av testresultat. Du har stort intresse för innovation och ständiga förbättringar inom testområdet och erfarenhet av tekniska tester såsom automatisering inom olika applikationslager, hantering av testmiljöer samt kunskap kring icke-funktionella tester med fokus på prestanda, där du kan på egen hand programmera och implementera automatiska tester. Men främst är du en passionerad, kreativ och initiativtagande testare som lever våra värderingar: enkelhet, engagemang och entreprenörskap.
   

  

 För att vara aktuell för denna roll talar du svenska och engelska obehindrat.
   

  

 Därför ska du välja ICA Banken
   

  

 Varje dag är en härlig utmaning på ICA Banken & ICA Försäkring. Varför det? Jo, för att hela vår bransch håller på att förändras. Och den förändringen öppnar för spännande utmaningar där gamla invanda sätt att jobba utmanas. Det betyder också att vi måste hålla oss i konstant utveckling. På riktigt. Både som individer och som verksamhet. Vi behöver föra samman innovation och digitalisering i en härlig kombination, där vi tillsammans kan hitta de där smarta och praktiska lösningarna som kunderna knappt vet om att de behöver. Än.
   

  

 Vad händer nu?
   

  

 Sista dag för ansökan är 2024/10/31, men du är varmt välkommen med din ansökan redan nu!
   

  

 Har du frågor gällande rekryteringsprocessen kontakta ansvarig rekryterande chef Carolina på carolina.saccardo.strandberg@ica.se
   

  

 ICA ska spegla våra kunder och samhället, vi strävar därför efter att anställa människor med olika bakgrund, kompetenser, kunskap och erfarenheter. Vi värnar om goda arbetsmiljöförhållanden med mål om helt rökfria arbetsplatser. Om roller kräver det så behöver du genomgå tester, bakgrundskontroller och drogtestning innan anställning.

title: Data Engineer
company_industry: Non-profit Organizations and Primary and Secondary Education
description:
***We're looking for an ambitious and driven Data Engineer to join our team in building our modern scalable data platform!***
 Two is bringing the very best of B2C e-commerce to B2B. We're passionate about building solutions that enable B2B Merchants to sell more, faster, and more efficiently. Growing 30% month-on-month, our goal is to become the world's largest B2B payment solution by 2027. We're backed by the very best VCs in the world — raised over €30m from Sequoia, Shine, Local Globe, Antler, Posten and influential angel investors in Fintech.
   

  

 Two is built by a passionate and energetic team with second-time founders with successful exits. We are a small, but mighty team leading Two into new countries. We have a global mindset, but deeply understand local nuance. We are entrepreneurs at heart, problem-solving to launch new countries end to end. We are team players that execute diligently from ideation to reality. We believe in diversity in opinions and ideas and expect all employees to think like an owner.
   

  

**Location**
 We are seeking a candidate to join one of our offices in London, Glasgow, Oslo or Stockholm. Our work model embraces a hybrid approach, offering employees the flexibility to work both onsite and from home.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are currently looking to expand our Data Team with an experienced and ambitious Data Engineer with a passion for building a highly scalable data platform!
   

  

 You'd be joining a fast-paced Data Team whose mission is to empower business decisions by provisioning quality data information and ML Engineers by building scalable Feature Engineering platform. We have a data-driven culture and believe that data wealth and the ability to leverage it effectively is what sets us apart!
   

  

 You will be working closely with stakeholders across business divisions to enable quality decisions based on clean, trusted, and enriched data.
   

  

 This is a fantastic opportunity in one of the most exciting and fast-growing start-ups of the global Fintech industry with the mission to revolutionise B2B payments!
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
 The role requires a proactive and independent individual, who understands the challenges of working in a startup, wants to own the problem, and is able to design data solutions with great attention to the quality of products being delivered. Your main responsibilities will be to:
   

  

* Lead the design and implementation of a scalable and reliable data platform at Two
* Scale our Data Analytics platform across the company in the most cost-effective way
* Help establish a data culture across the business by implementing a self-serve data platform
* Build pipelines to enrich internal data with data from 3rd parties by using different integration tools such as Airflow, Airbytes, etc
* Be the key player in architecting and building our Feature Engineering and Feature Store platforms to be leveraged by the Data Science and Machine Learning teams
* Ensure quality of data delivered to end user


**Technologies We Use:**
* Our foundational core products run as micro-services on Kubernetes
* Python and Golang for our back-end applications
* PostgreSQL, BigQuery, Spark for distributed data storage and compute
* Two cloud infrastructure is hosted on Google Cloud Platform
* Our CI/CD pipeline consists of Github Actions, Helm and Terraform


**Requirements**
* At least 5 years of experience in working with the cloud platforms, ideally GCP or AWS
* Experience in designing and building data pipelines in the cloud, working experience with data integration tools or APIs ( Airflow, dbt, Fivetran, Airbytes etc.)
* Strong SQL skills and ability to tune SQL performance in RDBMS (PostgreSQL) as well as columnar store (BigQuery, Redshift)
* Strong understanding of CI/CD principals
* DevOps experience is a bonus
* Track record of successfully achieving your set goals and meeting tight deadlines
* You are ambitious, reliable, and resilient with a can-do attitude, always with a suggestion for a solution rather than just explaining a problem!


**Benefits**
* 25 days paid time off per year + public holidays 🌴
* Annual allowance to spend on anything that will contribute to your mental or physical health 🤸
* Allowance towards a phone device every 24 months (from your 6th month anniversary) 📱
* Annual allowance for learning and training 📚

title: PRE-REGISTRATION FOR SCANIA I-TALENT RECRUITMENT 2025!
description:
For the ninth time, Scania is launching their highly appreciated I-Talent Program! This is the program for you who have a strong drive to develop, who is eager to contribute with new ideas, and who wants to be a part of the work to drive the transition to a more sustainable transport industry! Are you about to graduate or have a maximum a couple of years of working experience within IT? Then this program is for you!
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**Company :**
 Scania CV Aktiebolag
 



  

**City :**
 Södertälje/Hybrid
 



  

**Job Category :**
 IT
 



  

**Extent :**
 Full time
 



  

**Start date :**
 September 2025
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Recruitment
 



  

**Other :**
 Possibility to work remote
 



  

**Other :**
 Grönt jobb
   




**About the role**

 Scania is one of Sweden’s largest companies, offering trucks and buses for heavy transport along with a wide range of related services. Their goal is to drive the transition to a sustainable transport system by developing safe, smart, and energy-efficient transport solutions that are better for both people and our planet. They currently have around 50,000 employees in approximately 100 countries, and together with partners and customers, they are driving the transition to a more sustainable transport industry, being both trendsetters and pioneers in electrification and sustainable transport systems.
 


  


 Along with several other I-Talents, you will be offered a unique opportunity to participate in a program that will kickstart your journey at Scania. You will be employed in a specific role and belong to a team but will alternate your work in your role with training sessions alongside other I-Talents. The program starts every fall and is designed for you who are at the beginning of your career, ensuring that you have the best possible conditions to grow into your role. In addition to working in your team, the program primarily consists of three parts: “Learning your professional role,” “Go-and-see,” and “Training.” This also provides excellent opportunities to build a strong network within Scania. In addition to your I-Talent colleagues and your immediate manager, you will also be assigned a buddy who will be there for you during your first time in the role.
 


  


 At Scania, you will find a multicultural work environment with ambitious colleagues and a company that invests in its leadership. There is room for everyone to grow, whether you want to be a generalist, specialist, or leader. If you have the right attitude and are motivated to take responsibility, you will have endless opportunities for development!
 


  

  

**We are looking for**

  

**PLEASE NOTE!**
  

 The recruitment for the 2025 program will begin in November 2024, and we will recruit I-Talents for several departments and cities. By registrating an expression of interest through this advert, you do not guarantee a place in the program; instead, you sign up to receive ongoing information and updates about the process, as well as the link to the job advertisement when the recruitment process begins.
 


  


  

**You will need to apply again**
 during the official application period. Then you will have the possibility to express interest in specific roles/teams within the program.
 


  

  
* A post-secondary education in system science, computer engineering, networking, infrastructure, or similar.
  
* Maximum of two years of working experience within IT by the start of the program in September 2025.
  
* Knowledge of one or more programming languages such as JAVA, C, C++, C#, JavaScript, or equivalent. Some roles may require knowledge in one or more specific programming languages.
  
* Professional knowledge in English, as it is the primary working language.
  
* For some roles, verbal and written knowledge in Swedish may be required due to assignments and contacts in the role.
  


  


  

**Recruitment Process**



  

  
* Pre-registration
  
* Official application period
  
* Phone interview with Academic Work
  
* Tests (problem-solving + personality)
  
* In-depth interview with Academic Work

title: Företag inom IT-infrastruktur söker Field Service Infrastructure Engineer
description:
Är du en tekniskt kunnig och lösningsorienterad person med erfarenhet inom datacenter? Vill du vara en del av ett innovativt företag som ligger i framkant av IT-infrastruktur och tekniska lösningar? På uppdrag av kund söker vi nu flera drivna och engagerade Field Service Infrastructure Engineers för att stärka deras team och bidra till deras fortsatta framgång. Om du brinner för att leverera högkvalitativ teknisk support och vill arbeta i en dynamisk och utvecklande miljö, då kan detta vara möjligheten för dig!
 



  

**Plats :**
 Solna

 IT

 Heltid, Skift

**Om tjänsten**

 På uppdrag av kund söker vi nu en skicklig Field Service Infrastructure Engineer som kan arbeta på plats i deras kunders datacenter. Denna roll är avgörande för att tillhandahålla omfattande teknisk support till deras kunder och säkerställa smidig drift och distribution av kritisk datacenterinfrastruktur. Du kommer att bestå av ett team med nio kollegor med en spridning mellan kontoren i Borås och Stockholm. Det kan förekomma även förekomma jobb på annan ort.
 


  


 Kunden är ett ledande teknikföretag specialiserat på avancerade datacenterlösningar och IT-infrastruktur. De levererar tjänster inom bland annat datacenterinfrastruktur och IT-drift, säkra kommunikationslösningar, containertjänster, service och support 24/7, säkerhetslösningar, applikationsdrift och tredjepartsservice. De har strategiska partnerskap med ledande tillverkare och referenslösningar hos flera av Nordens mest krävande IT-verksamheter i både den privata och offentliga sektorn.
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* En dynamisk och stimulerande arbetsmiljö.
  
* Möjlighet att arbeta med spännande och utmanande projekt.
  
* Möjligheter till vidareutbildning och professionell utveckling.
  
* En tillsvidareanställning via Academic Work med fast månadslön. Goda möjligheter till överrekrytering efter 6 månader.
  

  


**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Incidenthantering för kontinuerlig drift.
  
* Hantering av olika datacenteraktiviteter, såsom att byta ut nätverksenheter, konfigurera servrar, utföra strömcykler och hantera kabeldragning/patchhantering.
  
* Generera periodiska rapporter enligt kundens specifikationer.
  
* Tillhandahålla logistiskt stöd för tillgångshantering och datacenterplanering.
  
* Delta i felanalys enligt anvisningar från kundens ingenjörsteam.
  
* Resor inom tjänsten kan förekomma
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Har examen inom ett datorrelaterat område (datorvetenskap, elektroteknik, telekommunikation eller liknande).
  
* Har 3 till 5 års relevant teknisk support-erfarenhet.
  
* Har stark kunskap om lagring, nätverk och serverhårdvara.
  
* Är en lagspelare
  
* Innehar B-körkort
  


  


  

**Det är meriterande om du har**



  

  
* Certifiering inom CompTIA A+ eller motsvarande, CompTIA Server+ eller motsvarande, MCP/MCSE-certifiering.
  
* Bred erfarenhet inom nätverk och hårdvara
  


  


  

**För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egenskaper:**



  

  
* Flexibel
  
* Kommunikativ
  
* Noggrann
  
* Problemlösare
  
* Prestigelös
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**

title: Test Case Creatior till Toptracer!
description:
Detta är en stor möjlighet för dig som är student och vill vara en del av att bygga världens bästa system för att spåra golfbollar. Perfekt roll för dig som studerar och vill ha ett meriterande och flexibelt extrajobb vid sidan av!
 



  

**Företag :**
 Topgolf Sweden AB
 



  

**Plats :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Deltid, cirka 8 timmar i veckan
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Omgående
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Konsultuppdrag
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Toptracer Technologies har användare och tittare över hela världen. Deras uppdrag är att hjälpa människor att uppleva ännu mer av det fantastiska spelet golf genom att spåra bidrag till TV- och driving range-teknologi. Deras rangeteknik används i 32 länder och sändningarna visas över 270 gånger varje år. Alla deras produkter utvecklas, testas och distribueras från kontoret i Mörby Centrum.
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* En möjlighet att få meriterande erfarenhet inom IT
  
* Ett flexibelt schema för att kunna kombinera skola med arbete
  
* Som konsult för Academic Work erbjuder vi stora möjligheter för dig att växa professionellt, bygga ditt nätverk och skapa värdefulla kontakter för framtiden
  

  


**Arbetsuppgifter**

 Du kommer att tillhöra Toptracers Tracking Core algorithm team där du kommer att vara med på resan att bygga världens bästa system för att tracka golfbollar. En viktig del för Toptracer är att veta var golfbollarna befinner sig i deras inspelade data. Därför behöver teamet nu stärka upp med en noggrann person som kan hjälpa dem att annotera och skapa testfall från den data de har samlat in från över 1 000 golfbanor runt om i världen. Du kommer att få stöttning från ditt team för att få rätt förutsättningar i rollen.
 


  


 Inledningsvis är vårt mål att du arbetar cirka 8 timmar per vecka under 4 månader, med möjlighet att öka till 12-16 timmar per vecka, beroende på efterfrågan och mängden data vi kan tillhandahålla.
   




**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Studerar inom data/ computer science på universitet och har minst 1,5 år kvar av dina studier
  
* Har goda programmeringskunskaper, gärna i Python
  
* Har flytande språkkunskaper i svenska och engelska, då båda språken används i arbetet
  
* Kan kombinera dina studier med att arbeta minst 8 timmar i veckan
  


  


 Om du har ett intresse för golf är det ett stort plus!
 


  


  

**För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egenskaper:**



  

  
* Ett öga för detaljer
  
* Har tålamod och har ett metodiskt tillvägagångssätt
  
* Är en bra lyssnare och teamplayer
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**

title: Associates till verksamhetsgruppen för IT-rätt, immaterialrätt och media
description:
Vill du arbeta med utmanande och omväxlande uppdrag inom IT-rätt, immaterialrätt och media? Har du ett genuint intresse för både affären och juridiken? Just nu söker vi flera kollegor till vår grupp inom IT-rätt, immaterialrätt och media!
   

  

 Cederquist rankas som en av Sveriges absolut främsta advokatbyråer. Vår grupp inom IT, immaterialrätt och media arbetar i uppdrag med stor variation för en bred kundbas i vitt skilda olika branscher. Vi är stolta över vår ”Cederquist-anda” som uppmuntrar och stimulerar erfarenhetsutbyten, samarbete, personlig utveckling och trivsel. Allt vi gör på Cederquist präglas av våra tre värderingar: lyhördhet, engagemang och kvalitet.
   

  

**Vad erbjuder vi dig?**
 Som Associate På Cederquist Blir Du Del Av En Etablerad Verksamhet Med Ett Starkt Varumärke. Vår Rådgivning Och Vårt Erbjudande Täcker Samtliga Juridiska Aspekter Inom Områdena IT-rätt, Immaterialrätt Och Media, Vilket Bland Annat Inkluderar
   

  

* Att biträda kunder i komplexa IT-affärer som tex. outsourcing och systemupphandlingar.
* Rådgivning i frågor om integritetsskydd och informationssäkerhet.
* Upprättande av avtal och rådgivning vid exploatering av immateriella rättigheter av olika slag, samt i marknadsföringsfrågor.


 Vi strävar alltid efter att lämna pragmatiska och kommersiellt gångbara råd. Du blir en viktig del av vårt team med motiverade medarbetare, och vi hoppas att du vill vara med och fortsätta att utveckla vår verksamhet.
   

  

 Cederquist vill också ge dig de bästa förutsättningarna att utvecklas både professionellt, juridiskt och personligt. Därför erbjuder vi en plattform för en långsiktigt hållbar karriär, och alla jurister hos oss får en individuellt utformad utvecklingsplan med fokus på affärsutveckling och ledarskap.
   

  

**Vem söker vi?**
 Nu söker vi flera kollegor med relevant arbetslivserfarenhet från advokatbyrå och/eller bolag, med kunskap inom IT-rätt, immaterialrätt och/eller media. Kanske är du en mer senior jurist, med erfarenhet av att skriva, granska och förhandla avtal, som letar efter nya utmaningar och perspektiv? Eller så är du tidigare i din karriär och vill utvecklas i nära samarbete med marknadens ledande specialister? Vi breddar teamet på flera nivåer och söker därmed jurister med olika lång arbetslivserfarenhet, men samtliga med minst tre års arbetslivserfarenhet.
   

  

 Du som söker har erfarenhet av att självständigt granska, skriva och förhandla olika avtal rörande IT och immaterialrätt och andra kommersiella avtal. Vi arbetar mycket med avtal och andra texter, och tror att grunden för en bra juridisk rådgivning är en god kommersiell förståelse för våra klienters verksamhet och behov. Därför ser vi givetvis att du har ett intresse för kommersiella avtal, samt en god känsla för språk.
   

  

 Vi tror även att du är proaktiv, uppdaterad mot omvärlden och delar dina kunskaper med både kunder och kollegor. Du är en pragmatisk problemlösare som kan sätta juridiken i ett sammanhang. Cederquists specialistgrupp inom IT-rätt och immaterialrätt har dessutom en stark energi och identitet och därför fäster vi också stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
   

  

**Välkommen med din ansökan!**
 Vi ber dig bifoga CV, personligt brev samt betyg från universitet. Intervjuer sker löpande. Startdatum enligt överenskommelse.
   

  

 Vid frågor kontakta Vilma Hartwig, HR Generalist, vilma.hartwig@cederquist.se
   

  

**Om Cederquist**
 Cederquist är en av Sveriges främsta affärsjuridiska byråer och erbjuder specialistkompetens inom de flesta affärsjuridiska områden. Vi arbetar på en global marknad och är idag 170 medarbetare, som med utveckling, resultat och glädje i fokus arbetar tillsammans under ett tak på Blasieholmen i Stockholm. Cederquist är en modern och tydligt värderingsstyrd organisation uppbyggd utifrån en true partnership-struktur där beslutsvägarna är korta och effektiva. Detta ger oss de bästa möjligheterna att bygga små och effektiva team anpassade för varje kunds unika förutsättningar och behov.

title: Automation Engineer - Ansible
description:
**Job Summary:** 




 We are seeking an experienced Automation Engineer specializing in Ansible to join our team. The ideal candidate will have strong experience with Linux system administration, scripting, and automating infrastructure, applications, and cloud resources. You will design, develop, and maintain Ansible playbooks, modules, and roles, and collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate automation into CI/CD pipelines and DevOps workflows.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Design, develop, and maintain Ansible playbooks, roles, and modules to automate the deployment and configuration of infrastructure, applications, and cloud resources.
* Integrate Ansible with other DevOps tools and CI/CD pipelines to build seamless end-to-end automation workflows.
* Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to Ansible automation, and provide support to teams using Ansible.
* Ensure the stability and performance of the Ansible automation platform, meeting SLAs for automation services.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and understand business requirements, translating them into Ansible-based solutions.
* Maintain and enhance the security of automation platforms, ensuring compliance with best practices.



  





**Required Skills & Experience:** 



* 5+ years of experience in IT automation, with a focus on Ansible.
* Hands-on experience with Linux system administration and shell scripting (Bash, PowerShell, Python, etc.).
* Strong understanding of DevOps principles and experience integrating Ansible with CI/CD pipelines.
* Proven ability to troubleshoot and debug issues in Ansible automation environments.
* Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively in cross-functional teams.
* Experience with cloud infrastructure (AWS, Azure, or GCP) is a plus.



  





**Qualifications:** 



* C3A or above in relevant certifications.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Proficiency with automation and orchestration concepts.

 Vi söker nu en Customer Service Agent till Dun and Bradstreet och ett av deras tre team på kundservice.
